name.baseName: Lithium Carbonate Production ; Battery Grade Lithium Carbonate ; Precipitation ; Concentrated Brine, Atacama Salt Lake, Chile
碳酸锂生产 ; 电池级碳酸锂 ; 沉淀法 ; 智利阿塔卡马盐湖高浓卤水

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Lithium has historically been produced from subterranean brines in the Andean mountain region of Chile in the area known as the “Lithium Triangle,” which also includes parts of Bolivia and Argentina. There are also several other lithium-rich brine locations throughout the world, and each brine has a unique chemical composition, which necessitates different processes for isolating the desired end products (Wietelmann and Steinbild, 2014). This LCA considers the brines in the Atacama Desert of Chile, known as the Salar de Atacama. The brines are concentrated, processed into battery grade Li2CO3 and LiOH•H2O, and shipped worldwide for processing into battery cathode materials and, eventually, batteries.

历史上，锂一直产自智利安第斯山区的地下卤水，该地区被称为 "锂三角"，还包括玻利维亚和阿根廷的部分地区。全世界还有其他几个富含锂的卤水产地，每种卤水都有独特的化学成分，因此需要不同的工艺来分离出所需的最终产品（Wietelmann 和 Steinbild，2014 年）。本项生命周期评估考虑的是智利阿塔卡马沙漠中的卤水，即阿塔卡马盐湖。盐水经过浓缩，加工成电池级 Li2CO3 和 LiOH-H2O，然后运往世界各地加工成电池阴极材料，最终制成电池。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: At the Salar de Atacama operation, there are two separate pathways: lithium and potash separation. The lithium pathway has two flows of potassium into the potash pathway, while the potash pathway has no flows back to the lithium pathway. Because potash is a coproduct of the overall system, we need to allocate the energy consumed in the production of potash into our modeling. While we largely focus on the specifics of the lithium production pathway, we also track the flow of potassium chloride (KCl) to the potash pathways. We also need to allocate energy and water associated with the various site operations not specific to either lithium or potash production that were detailed by the lithium producer. After the brine is pumped to the surface, it flows through several ponds before final dispatch as lithium chloride brine with a lithium concentration of ~6%. The extracted brine is managed in the pond system for approximately one year while water is successively evaporated and lithium is concentrated. In the process, various salts are extracted from the ponds, which facilitates the removal of impurities from the brine and further increases the lithium concentration. The final brine is shipped for conversion to Li2CO3. We tracked the flow of LiCl brine and KCl, the value products for this system. Proprietary information from the producer specifies the quantity of KCl associated with the flows. In addition to the flow of KCl as a valuable coproduct, there are losses of lithium, along with water and other minerals in the system, to system infiltration (i.e., the flow of brine back into the earth). Lithium is also stored within the system in the form of brine, harvested salt, and impregnated salts. We obtained data for the input and output flows for 2018 for each pond, allowing process -level analysis of this LCA effort

在阿塔卡马盐湖作业区，有两条独立的途径：锂和钾盐分离。锂矿路线有两股钾流进入钾矿路线，而钾矿路线没有钾流返回锂矿路线。由于钾肥是整个系统的副产品，我们需要在建模中分配生产钾肥所消耗的能量。虽然我们主要关注锂生产途径的具体情况，但我们也会跟踪氯化钾（KCl）流向钾盐途径的情况。我们还需要分配锂生产商详细说明的与锂或钾肥生产无关的各种现场操作相关的能源和水。卤水被泵送到地面后，会流经几个池塘，最后以氯化锂卤水（锂浓度约为 6%）的形式排放。提取的卤水在池塘系统中管理约一年时间，同时水被陆续蒸发，锂被浓缩。在此过程中，各种盐类被从池塘中提取出来，这有利于去除盐水中的杂质，进一步提高锂的浓度。最后的盐水被运往转化为 Li2CO3。我们跟踪了氯化锂盐水和氯化钾的流向，它们是该系统的价值产品。生产商提供的专有信息说明了与流量相关的氯化钾数量。除了作为有价值副产品的氯化钾的流动外，系统中的锂与水和其他矿物质也会因系统渗透（即盐水流回地下）而损失。锂还会以盐水、收获盐和浸渍盐的形式储存在系统中。我们获得了 2018 年每个池塘的输入和输出流量数据，从而可以对这项生命周期评估工作进行流程级分析
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the production of battery-grade lithium carbonate, primarily through the precipitation method using concentrated brine from the Atacama Salt Lake in Chile. The lithium carbonate produced is mainly used in the manufacture of lithium-ion batteries, which are essential components for electric vehicles, portable electronics, and energy storage systems.
该数据集描述了智利阿塔卡马盐湖高浓卤水沉淀法生产电池级碳酸锂的工艺。所产生的碳酸锂主要用于制造锂离子电池，这是电动车、便携式电子产品以及储能系统不可或缺的关键部件。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for life cycle assessment, please note that it does not include the production processes for raw materials or the energy flows that account for less than 1% of the total process. Users should consider these exclusions in their assessment and, if necessary, supplement the data with information on the production of raw materials and minor energy flows. Careful attention should be given to the methodological boundaries of the dataset to ensure consistency with the goal and scope of the intended LCA study.
使用本数据集进行生命周期评估时，请注意它并未包括原材料的生产流程以及占总流程少于1%的能源流。用户应在评估时考虑这些排除因素，并在必要时，用原材料生产和小量能源流的信息补充数据。应仔细关注数据集的方法论边界，确保与预定的LCA研究目标和范围的一致性。
